data.title: Why isnâ€™t a movie or TV show available for download?
data.meta_description: Some titles may be available to stream but not for download due to rights issues, costs, or other factors.
data.text:
TV shows and movies from Netflix and other content providers can be downloaded on our Android, iPhone, iPad, Google Chromebook, and Amazon Fire apps.

For general information about downloading titles, see How to download titles to watch offline.
